TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SiteIdentityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SiteIdentityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为 Url 中使用的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议的代码定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 URL 是http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站点可以匹配，完全正确，或使用通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符的前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. 如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确匹配。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站点名称字符串 \* 将匹配任何站点，但将与无站点证据的代码不匹配。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，即使调用程序集是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是说，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，但如果程序集不符合要求的条件故障的标识权限的需求。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，标识权限的要求是如果调用程序集具有完全信任关系无效。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保所有权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 声明是允许的范围取决于的使用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 声明的安全特性的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中的存储，以及在运行时访问系统。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction action) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

summary.span: 创建并返回一个新的 实例。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅应由安全系统中，永远不会由应用程序代码调用。This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 此方法返回与此特性相对应的权限从创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Site { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Site : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置调用代码的站点名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the site name of the calling code.

value.span: 要与安全提供程序所指定站点名称相比较的站点名称。

span.span: The site name to compare against the site name specified by the security provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为 Url 中使用的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议的代码定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 URL 是http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站点可以匹配，完全正确，或使用通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符的前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. 如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确匹配。Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.
